title: Ensure Administrative accounts are cloud-only
description: Ensure administrative accounts are not On-premises sync enabled
remediation: Migrate hybrid admin accounts to new cloud-only accounts and update roles accordingly.

title: Ensure two emergency access accounts have been defined
description: Emergency access or �break glass� accounts are limited for emergency scenarios where normal administrative accounts are unavailable.
evaluation_path: Microsoft 365 admin center > Users > Active Users and Entra admin center > Protection > Conditional Access
remediation: Create two cloud-only accounts with Global Admin role, no license, exclude from Conditional Access rules.

title: Ensure that between two and four global admins are designated
description: Between two and four global administrators should be designated in the tenant to ensure redundancy and limit exposure.
evaluation_path: Microsoft 365 admin center > Roles > Global Administrator
remediation: Add or remove users from Global Admin role to maintain 2�4 total.

title: Ensure administrative accounts use licenses with reduced application footprint
description: Administrative accounts should not use licenses with applications to reduce attack surface.
expected_value: License with no user applications (e.g. Entra ID P1/P2)
evaluation_path: Microsoft 365 admin center > Users > Active users > License column
remediation: Assign minimal license or Entra ID P1/P2 to admin accounts. Use PIM if applicable.

title: Ensure that only organizationally managed/approved public groups exist
description: Ensure that only organizationally managed and approved public groups exist to prevent unauthorized access to internal data.
evaluation_path: Microsoft 365 admin center > Teams & groups > Active teams & groups
remediation: Change group privacy from Public to Private in group settings.

title: Ensure sign-in to shared mailboxes is blocked
description: Block sign-in access for shared mailboxes to reduce exposure to unauthorized access.
evaluation_path: Microsoft 365 admin center > Users > Active users > Shared mailbox properties
remediation: Uncheck the 'Sign-in allowed' option under mailbox settings.

title: Ensure the 'Password expiration policy' is set to 'Set passwords to never expire (recommended)'
description: Avoid enforcing periodic password changes unless a compromise is suspected.
evaluation_path: Microsoft 365 admin center > Org Settings > Security & Privacy > Password expiration policy
remediation: Enable the 'Set passwords to never expire' option in org settings.

title: Ensure 'Idle session timeout' is set to '3 hours (or less)' for unmanaged devices
description: Limit idle session timeout for unmanaged devices to reduce session hijack risks.
evaluation_path: Microsoft 365 admin center > Org settings > Security & privacy > Idle session timeout
remediation: Configure timeout policy in settings for unmanaged device sessions.

title: Ensure 'External sharing' of calendars is not available
description: Prevent external calendar sharing to avoid data leakage and preserve internal privacy.
evaluation_path: Microsoft 365 admin center > Settings > Org settings > Calendar
remediation: Disable external calendar sharing in org settings.

title: Ensure 'User owned apps and services' is restricted
description: Restrict user ability to register applications to control third-party integrations.
evaluation_path: Microsoft Entra admin center > User settings > App registrations
remediation: Disable 'Users can register applications' in user settings.

title: Ensure internal phishing protection for Forms is enabled
description: Enable internal phishing detection for Microsoft Forms to prevent credential harvesting.
evaluation_path: Microsoft 365 admin center > Settings > Org settings > Microsoft Forms
remediation: Enable internal phishing protection in Microsoft Forms settings.

title: Ensure the customer lockbox feature is enabled
description: Require explicit customer approval before Microsoft can access customer content.
evaluation_path: Microsoft 365 compliance center > Solutions > Customer Lockbox
remediation: Enable Customer Lockbox via Microsoft 365 compliance center.

title: Ensure 'third-party storage services' are restricted in 'Microsoft 365 on the web'
description: Restrict access to third-party storage services like Dropbox or Google Drive to protect data.
evaluation_path: Microsoft 365 admin center > Org settings > Services > Office for the web
remediation: Disable integration with third-party storage services.

title: Ensure that Sways cannot be shared with people outside of your organization
description: Prevent sharing of Microsoft Sway content outside the organization to maintain internal content privacy.
evaluation_path: Microsoft 365 admin center > Settings > Org settings > Sway
remediation: Manually disable external sharing for Sway presentations.
